channel.title: This forum needs a Port Forward Guide
channel.description: Many people have been asking how do i port forward? YOu guys are always replieing if you dont know how then you shouldnt run a server, Were just trying to learn, I suggest that this forum make a tut On how to port forward, Like step by step, Not that one that just says connect to 4435, So whos got the balls to step up and make this tut?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 17, 2006, 06:10:33 PM[/size][hr]?

item.title: This forum needs a Port Forward Guide
